title: ICT Utilization Competency Enhancement Program for Higher Education Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Reflective Practice and Utilization of ICT Tools Specialized in Mathematics Curriculum

learning_goals: Learners complete interactive lesson designs using digital tools (GeoGebra, Desmos, etc.) in math classes with over 80% completion
Learners explain at least three linkages between educational objectives, tools, and content when designing ICT-based math learning activities
Learners apply two ICT strategies for instructor-learner feedback in online real-time environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
